channel.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
channel.description:
I started a walkthrough of this mod on Youtube, made it to the part where you get your first gun, the crowbar, and grenade. But none of the textures are loading, it's the only issue I have encountered and it's pretty much gameplay crippling.
I have attempted the Windows Update fix seen here [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14947[/url] and reinstalled the game plus Source SDK twice and it has not made a difference.
Please fast forward to 3:40 and on to see what I am talking about. This is the episode where I encounter the issue. [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OOVHeYWCSJQ[/url]

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
I hope this isn’t considered feeding a ghost thread -> So here I go:

  • Crowbar was invisible after I picked it up.
  • So I randomly started a new chapter. All weapons were ok.
  • Quickloaded. Crowbar is still invisible after I pick it up, plus Mr. Purple is back in this corridor.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Raxeus
item.description:
I think having to start a new game is an unacceptable solution. Now I, myself, must redo a whole chapter, kinda lame. Makes me wonder what the problem is and if there is a better way to fix it, no telling if it happens again later on in the game at this point.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Problematic_A-hole
item.description:
Natokill4:

All is fixed, started a new campaign and everything works, how sad I should have done this a long time ago.

that’s good to know

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Got them, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Natokill4
item.description:
Cpl.1nsane:

Glad to hear. I’m still not sure exactly what was causing the issue in the first place, do you still have the save files from that playthrough? If so could you upload them somewhere for me?

https://gamergoto.net/SAVE.rar

Let me know what you discover if you can, I’m curious myself. If you plan on playing with my broken save file I would recommend using the most recent save because I think it’s the only one where I have unlocked weapons, but I can’t remember.

Also can you let me know when you have downloaded it because I’ll delete the file from my server after your confirmation. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Natokill4:

All is fixed, started a new campaign and everything works, how sad I should have done this a long time ago.

Glad to hear. I’m still not sure exactly what was causing the issue in the first place, do you still have the save files from that playthrough? If so could you upload them somewhere for me?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Natokill4
item.description:
Cpl.1nsane:

He has. Have you tried starting a new game all together and seeing if it still does it then?

All is fixed, started a new campaign and everything works, how sad I should have done this a long time ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
He has. Have you tried starting a new game all together and seeing if it still does it then?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Problematic_A-hole
item.description:
Have you tried re-downloading the mod?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Natokill4
item.description:
“r_drawviewmodel 1” did nothing, so I tried “give weapon_crowbar”, and that did nothing. But in the games defense I already had the crowbar lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Did you try the console command "r_drawviewmodel 1"?

If nothing happens with that try “give weapon_crowbar” please.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Natokill4
item.description:
Cpl.1nsane:

Hrm, nothing there that relates to the weapon models or textures.

I think those two console commands I listed are counted as ‘cheats’ so you will need to use “sv_cheats 1” then try them again if possible.

Ok the wireframe command worked after using the cheats command, I see a wire mesh of everything but the weapon models. See below. Also is an copy of the new console log.

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Problematic_A-hole
item.description:
Natokill4:

I cannot enter the console, no matter what keyboard key I set the console to, absolutely nothing happens when I press it.

go to keyboard config, click ‘‘advanced’’ and then ''enable developer’s console"

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Natokill4
item.description:
Cpl.1nsane:

Ah whoops, looks to me like the model isn’t displaying properly rather than the textures.

Try setting “mat_wireframe 1” in console and tell me if you see a wireframe mesh of the weapon models.

If not Try setting “r_drawviewmodel 1” in console.

Also if you can add “-condebug” to the launch options of black mesa (right click > properties > set launch options) while you’re playing, then once you have closed black mesa a file will be created in the BMS directory called console.log which can be opened with notepad/notepad++. If you could upload that somewhere that would be handy, thanks.

I cannot enter the console, no matter what keyboard key I set the console to, absolutely nothing happens when I press it.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Ah whoops, looks to me like the model isn’t displaying properly rather than the textures.

Try setting “mat_wireframe 1” in console and tell me if you see a wireframe mesh of the weapon models.

If not Try setting “r_drawviewmodel 1” in console.

Also if you can add “-condebug” to the launch options of black mesa (right click > properties > set launch options) while you’re playing, then once you have closed black mesa a file will be created in the BMS directory called console.log which can be opened with notepad/notepad++. If you could upload that somewhere that would be handy, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Natokill4
item.description:
Cpl.1nsane:

Would it be possible for you take a screenshot for me?

A screenshot of what? If you watch the video as I instructed in the original first post you can see in real time my anguish.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing

Would it be possible for you take a screenshot for me?

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: mshee32

item.title: Weapon Textures Not Appearing
item.dc:creator: Natokill4
item.description:
Bad Motor Scooter:

I have same issue, same solutions attempted, no dice.

I’m still in the first levels of the game, working through without player character weapon models, but I foresee it becoming a game-breaking issue as I progress much further…

Running GTX 260 on Win Vistax64. Game runs flawlessly otherwise (as far as I can tell).

And yet no one is helping us, sad face. There has to be a simple solution to this.

Read full topic
